Item ID6004

A bittercap mushroom (or bittercap) is a type of fungus. While they are not edible by themselves, they are non-poisonous and have a variety of culinary and other uses.

Contents

  • 1 Products
  • 2 Uses
  • 3 Item sources
  • 4 Obtaining

Uses[edit | edit source]

  • Mushrooms may be added to a compost bin to make supercompost.
  • Eight mushrooms may be used to pay a farmer to look after a whiteberry bush.
  • One mushroom is used to make fried mushrooms, which in turn are used to make mushroom potatoes.
  • Harvesting a patch of mushrooms is a requirement for the hard Morytania Diary.
  • Nine mushrooms are needed to fill the mud pit in the Tar Swamp on Fossil Island.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Bittercap Mushrooms Grown 1Always
Sulliuscep65 1Common

Obtaining[edit | edit source]

Players with 53 Farming can grow mushrooms from a mushroom spore in the mushroom patch near Canifis (close to the fairy ring CKS). This takes about four hours to grow and yields six mushrooms. Players do not need a spade to harvest this item. Harvesting grants 58 Farming experience per mushroom, for a total of 348 experience per patch.

Players with 65 Woodcutting can chop Sulliuscep mushrooms on Fossil Island, which can produce bittercap mushrooms.

[[File:Mushroom detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''bittercap mushroom''' (or '''bittercap''') is a type of fungus. While they are not edible by themselves, they are non-poisonous and have a variety of culinary and other uses.
==Products==
{{Uses material list|Mushroom}}

==Uses==
*Mushrooms may be added to a compost bin to make [[supercompost]].
*Eight mushrooms may be used to pay a farmer to look after a [[whiteberry bush]].
*One mushroom is used to make [[fried mushrooms]], which in turn are used to make [[mushroom potato]]es.
*Harvesting a patch of mushrooms is a requirement for the [[Morytania Diary#Hard|hard Morytania Diary]].
*Nine mushrooms are needed to fill the [[mud pit]] in the [[Tar Swamp]] on [[Fossil Island]].

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Mushroom}}

==Obtaining==
Players with 53 [[Farming]] can grow mushrooms from a [[mushroom spore]] in the [[mushroom patch]] near [[Canifis]] (close to the [[fairy ring]] {{Fairycode|CKS}}). This takes about four hours to grow and yields six mushrooms. Players do not need a [[spade]] to harvest this item. Harvesting grants 58 Farming [[experience]] per mushroom, for a total of 348 experience per patch.

Players with 65 [[Woodcutting]] can chop [[Sulliuscep mushrooms]] on [[Fossil Island]], which can produce bittercap mushrooms.

{{Farming produce}}
